patterns: Registering for Orientation online
how to register for orientation
Orientation registration
responses:
Please visit the Register for Orientation web site for information about online Orientation registration.

If you have questions about Orientation, you can contact New Student and Family Programs at 507-389-5498 or email Orientation.

responses: You can check the bus schedule by following this link https://www.mnsu.edu/about-the-university/maps-and-transportation/buses-and-shuttles/bus-schedules-and-information/

patterns: What documents do I need to submit to apply to the college as an international student

How do I submit my documents, and what format should they be in (e.g., PDF, scanned copies, original hard copies)

Are there any specific requirements or restrictions on the types of documents that I can submit, such as minimum academic records or medical clearance
How long does it typically take for the college to review my documents and make an admission decision, and will I receive notification if any documents are missing or incomplete
Are there any resources or support available for international students who need assistance with obtaining or submitting their required documents
Can I contact someone at the college to discuss my specific situation and any questions or concerns I have about the document requirements for international students
responses: This is the document that you need to prepare: https://www.mnsu.edu/future-students/international-admissions/international-bachelors-students/international-admissions-checklist/

patterns: Are there any upcoming student events on campus, and where can I find information about them

Can I bring friends or family members to the student event, and if so, do they also need to register or pay for the event
responses: here are some student event that you can attend: https://www.mnsu.edu/university-life/activities-and-organizations/student-events-team/
